alert.note: Alert for Manua; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 15 at 2:10PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... WHAT...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain is possible WHERE...Tutuila, Aunu`u and Manua WHEN...Through Saturday morning IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may cause flooding on roadways and properties and overflowing of streams. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Active trough over the islands will produced heavy rain and thunderstorms over the islands through Saturday morning. The trough will dissipate and move north by Saturday afternoon. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 210 Aoauli Aso Tofi Tesema 15 2022 ...UA IAI LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE TAEAO O LE ASO TOONA`I... MAFUAAGA...O tafega ma lologa e mafua mai i timuga mamafa e ono faatupulaia. NOFOAGA...Tutuila, Aunu`u ma Manua TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le taeao le Aso Toona`i. AAFIAGA...O timuga mamafa e mafai ona lolovaia ai aualatele ma nofoaga maualalalo. E mafai foi osofia tafega o vaitafe. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O uiga louloua o le tau e mafai ona faatupulaia ai timuga mamafa ma faititili i luga o le atunuu seia oo i le taeao o le Aso Toona`i. O le a taape nei uiga louloua o le tau i le aoauli o le Aso Toona`i. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleele, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.
